metadata.title: CVE-2023-7042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found inath10k_wmi_tlv_op_pull_mgmt_tx_compl_ev() indrivers/net/wireless/ath/ath10k/wmi-tlv.c in the Linux kernel. This issuecould be exploited to trigger a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
